sense.name: a person who collects discarded things
sense.examples: Scavengers go through the park each morning, collecting cans for the deposit. We went on a scavenger hunt at the junk yard to find a replacement door for the car.

sense.name: an animal that eats decayed material, carrion
sense.examples: Vultures are scavengers of the kills of other animals. Many types of insects are scavengers.

sense.name: chemical agent that removes impurities
sense.examples: The institute is developing chemical agent scavengers based on artificially mutated enzymes. It involves the selection of a scavenger or chelating agent to remove metallic impurities from the polymers.
